remarks: The predicate "is a lattice plane".  (Contributed by NM, 17-Jun-2012.)
statement:
islpln3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
islpln3.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
islpln3.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
islpln3.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
islpln3.n $e |- N = ( LLines ` K ) $.
islpln3.p $e |- P = ( LPlanes ` K ) $.
islpln3 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B ) -> ( X e. P <-> E. y e. N E. p e. A ( -. p .<_ y /\ X = ( y .\/ p ) ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ p $.
$d A p $.
$d B p y $.
$d K p y $.
$d N p y $.
$d X p y $.
